document.full_text: greece's hopes of averting default dimmed on saturday as fears grew the country may have missed fiscal targets set by its lenders while euro zone policymakers bickered on how to respond to the deepening crisis.
document.title: greece denies missed fiscal targets as eu bickers
lines_and_colors: greece's hopes of averting default dimmed on saturday as fears grew the country may have missed fiscal targets set by its lenders while euro zone policymakers bickered on how to respond to the deepening crisis.
